updated_cases.title: Validate that the policy-override-feature-enabled flag enable or disable the feature globally.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate that the policy-override-feature-enabled flag enable or disable the feature globally.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Set "policy-override-feature-enabled": true in staged_config.json.
Verify that configured policy_override blocks (both global and tenant-specific) are evaluated.
Set "policy-override-feature-enabled": false.
Verify that no policy_override blocks are evaluated, regardless of their configurations.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Overide policies are applied when the flag is enabled.
Overide policies are skipped when the flag is disabled (global and tenant-level).

updated_cases.title: Validate that the JSON syntax of policy_override is correct, including mandatory and optional fields.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate that the JSON syntax of policy_override is correct, including mandatory and optional fields.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create a valid configuration with start_time, end_time, bypass_url, and block_url.
Check missing start_time or end_time.
Check no bypass_url or block_url sections.
Reload configuration and monitor logs for parsing errors.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Valid configurations are accepted and evaluated.
Configurations missing required fields (start_time, end_time) are skipped.
mtnsproxy logs indicate any syntax issues during parsing.

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL bypass/block policies applied at the tenant-specific level.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate SSL bypass/block policies applied at the tenant-specific level.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a policy_override block to debug_settings.json for a specific tenant.
Include both bypass_url and block_url for specific domains and URLs.
Send test traffic matching the specified domains/URLs.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic to bypass_url domains/URLs is bypassed.
Traffic to block_url domains/URLs is blocked.

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL bypass/block policies applied globally.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate SSL bypass/block policies applied globally.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a policy_override block to staged_config.json with global rules.
Include both bypass_url and block_url for specific domains and URLs.
Send test traffic matching the specified domains/URLs.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic to bypass_url domains/URLs is bypassed.
Traffic to block_url domains/URLs is blocked.

updated_cases.title: Verify emergency overrides are applied only within the specified time range.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify emergency overrides are applied only within the specified time range.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Set start_time and end_time in UTC for the policy_override block.
Generate matching traffic before, during, and after the specified time range.
Reload configuration and observe traffic behavior at different timestamps.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Overrides are applied only during the specified time range.
Traffic outside the time range behaves normally.

updated_cases.title: Verify correct evaluation priority between global and tenant-specific configurations for both domains and URLs.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify correct evaluation priority between global and tenant-specific configurations for both domains and URLs.

updated_cases.title:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific block_url or block_domain rules override global bypass_url or bypass_domain rules.
updated_cases.custom_summary:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific block_url or block_domain rules override global bypass_url or bypass_domain rules.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a global rule in staged_config.json to bypass traffic for example.com.
Add a tenant-specific rule in debug_settings.json to block traffic for example.com.
Generate test traffic for example.com.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Traffic to example.com is blocked, following the tenant-specific rule.

updated_cases.title:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific bypass_url or bypass_domain rules override global block_url or block_domain rules.
updated_cases.custom_summary:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific bypass_url or bypass_domain rules override global block_url or block_domain rules.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a global rule in staged_config.json to block traffic for example.org.
Add a tenant-specific rule in debug_settings.json to bypass traffic for example.org.
Generate test traffic for example.org.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Traffic to example.org is bypassed, following the tenant-specific rule.

updated_cases.title:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that URL-specific rules are evaluated after domain-specific rules.
updated_cases.custom_summary:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that URL-specific rules are evaluated after domain-specific rules.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a global rule in staged_config.json to bypass traffic for example.net.
Add a global rule in staged_config.json to block traffic for example.net/page.html.
Generate test traffic for:
example.net
example.net/page.html
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic to example.net is bypassed.
Traffic to example.net/page.html is blocked.

updated_cases.title:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific URL rules override global URL rules.
updated_cases.custom_summary:
[Evaluation Priority]
Validate that tenant-specific URL rules override global URL rules.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add a global rule in staged_config.json to block traffic for example.com/resource.js.
Add a tenant-specific rule in debug_settings.json to bypass traffic for example.com/resource.js.
Generate test traffic for example.com/resource.js.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Traffic to example.com/resource.js is bypassed, following the tenant-specific rule.
